page.title: 12A Day in the life of Justin.
page.content:
A day in the life of Justin.
We come to school at 9.00 a.m. and get our reading books out, teacher calls the register and after a while we do topic or maths. After play we do English and at 12 noon we stop for dinner which we have at 12.30 p.m. In the afternoon we read and then have assembly and sometimes games at 3.00 we have a story, at 3.15 we go home and play football and cricket then we come in and play on the computer then we have tea. Afterwards we watch T.V. and then have supper, have a bath and go to bed.
